column5: Our pilot was following orders from their government. It went well except I had to borrow a used mask for the ride back to Red Lake.
Yep we were required to wear one as well going in, coming out were dealing with a wild situation so no one was asked,
Canâ€™t just leave it like that Vleye!!!! Dealing with a wild situation like what?????
No mention of a mask on our June 1st trip. The pilot didn't wear one nor were we asked.
A USED ONE ! way to go !
Wonder how many people used it before you Golden??

Ewwww, a used mask from someone you don't even know? I won't even wear a mask my wife has already worn. That's worse than wearing someone else's underwear. We brought our masks last September for our fly-in and were told "you don't need those here!" We were all vaccinated and confirmed negative, so if they were comfortable with us not wearing one, so were we.
How many is not a problem.Depends on what was used 4. 4 is not a preposition, is it?Actually it was a spare that had been used, then washed, before I used it to hide my face.
Not just in Canada where you might be asked to wear a mask. We have been informed we WILL be wearing a mask on our float plane trip out of Homer Ak next month.
